title: Learn advanced Vue.js tips & tricks
description:
Vue.js has become the framework of the year. It's very flexible, performant and easy to learn that lead to a massive adoption.

In this series I'll show you some stuff you can do with Vue.js that go beyond the basics and lean towards production apps.

posts.title: Lazy Loading in Vue using Webpack's Code Splitting
Write Unit Tests with vue-test-utils and Jest in Vue
Internationalize a Vue app using vue-i18n
Restrict access to Routes using Vue Route Guards
Create Higher Order Components using Render Functions and JSX in Vue
posts.meta: Use render a list based on its type example

title: Level up Vue.js Apps with TypeScript
description:
TypeScript adds an amazing developer experience with first class intellisense and type inference. Vue.js is very cool out of the box. Do you imagine both combined together?

In this serie I'll show you how to use TypeScript in a Vue.js application in depth, and some patterns it opens.

posts.title: Integrate TypeScript in your Vue project
Create class based Vue components in TypeScript
Add Type Safety to a Vuex Store using TypeScript
Use Dependency Injection and Inversion of Control containers in Vue and TypeScript with Inversify
Use Aspect Oriented Programming in Vue and TypeScript with KaopTS
